Text.Page:
Gutrends are running around everywhere! Preying on the weak. Our children can't even play anymore! It's just terrible!

There are some that seem to be targeting the kids. I assume those are the weakest of the groupâ€”the {@LinkCreature:6#2051#Gutrend reapers} and {@LinkCreature:6#2061#sentries}.

Knock 'em back and maybe we'll be able to let the children outside the house, at least.
Well, it's a step in the right direction. More to be done, but we'll be safer for a while.
